ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah is the Creator of everything and He is Guardian over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God is the creator of all things, and He is the guarantor of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah is the Creator of everything; He is the Guardian over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is the Creator and Guardian of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah is Creator of all things; and He only is the Controller of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Trustee over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah is the Creator of every thing and He has charge over every thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God is the Creator of every thing; He is Guardian over every thing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah is Creator of all things, and He is Guardian over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God is the Creator of all things, He has charge of everything;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah is the Creator everything, And He is over everything a Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah is creator of all things, and He watches over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Guardian and Disposer of all affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Wakil (Trustee, Disposer of affairs, Guardian, etc.) over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah is the Creator of all things, and of all things He is the Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God is the Creator of all things, and He is in Charge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:62] God is the Creator of all things and He is Guardian over all things, disposing of them as He will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah is Creator of all things) all things come from Allah, (and He is Guardian over all things) He is responsible for the provision of all creatures; it is also said that this means: He is a Witness over all things relating to their works.
